column4: hell when i try to install opera, i get this error: This application conflicts with other installed software. To install 'opera' the conflicting software must be removed before.
Switch to the advanced mode to resolve this conflict.
Hit enter instead of shift, sorry :P
But it is under Add/Remove programs? Are you sure?
I switched to main server and i see it
it says Depends: libc6 (>=2.5-0ubuntu1) but 2.4-1ubuntu12.3 is to be installed
Please state your ubuntu version. Dapper?
The version in the repos is only for dapper...
Ah, you're one step ahead of me.
thanks for your help, got everything working now
